line_connect.title: LINE Connect
line_connect.sentence: By connecting your LINE account to gochiisa account, you can login without using username and password. If you changed line account, you can reconnect by tapping the button again. LINE connect uses LINE Login API provided from LINE Official. Gochiira uses only Identify ID of your LINE account. We won't send any message by this feature. To know how it works, You can search 'OpenID Connect' on google.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.sentence1: This API provides the all datas in the site directly. You can use freely for develop your bot or collecting datas to machine learning.
api_key.sentence2: Currently, there are no documents for using. Please see network traffics with something tools, and use as is.

inviteInfo.title: Invite info
inviteInfo.sentence1: By telling this invite code to otherone, the user can register to gochiira.
inviteInfo.sentence2: However, If the user you invited got BAN or any restriction, You will get restriction too. Invite only you can trust.

about.title: About notify settings
about.sentence: This feature can notify to you when new arts are added. The notifies will sent in real time, and you can know newest arts as early. Currently, this feature only supports browser and line.

browser.title: Browser notify settings
browser.sentence: With this, you can get notifications with your browser app. When you tap「Setup」, it will ask you to accept notifications, and tap the Accept button. It you don't get anything after taps 「Setup」, please reload and try again. This setting is needed per your smartphone, computer and tablet. Total maximum devices is 5. If you want to change device after set 5 devices,  tap the reset button and accept the notifications on all devices again. This won't works on iOS or Mac devices.

line.title: LINE notify settings
line.sentence: With this, you can get notifications with your LINE app. The notify uses 'LINE Notify'. When you changed account, you can reconnect with tapping this button again.

twitter.title: Twitter notify settings (NYI)
twitter.sentence: This will be able to send notify via DM on Twitter. Sorry, this is not yet implemented.

acceptR18.title: Show NSFW images
acceptR18.description: If enabled, nsfw images will be displayed without any mosaics. ENABLE ONLY YOU ARE OVER THAN 18 AND DON'T HATE NSFW CONTENTS

isPC.title: PC version
isPC.description: If enabled, page layouts will be optimised for PC. Don't enable this on smartphones.

isLeftHanded.title: Left handed menu
isLeftHanded.description: If enabled, menu buttons position will be on left side, and swipe menus will appear from left side.

useSwipe.title: Swipe style menu
useSwipe.description: If enabled, menus will appear when you swipe. Don't enable on iOS, since this will disturb system navigation.

useBottom.title: Bottom menu
useBottom.description: If enabled, shortcuts will appear on bottom. Disable if your phone screen is small.

useBack.title: Back button
useBack.description: If enabled, back button will appear on bottom left. This may required if you are using iOS.

useJump.title: Jump to top button
useJump.description: If enabled, jump to top button will appear on bottom right.

useWebP.title: Use WebP
useWebP.description: If enabled, image data transfers will be reduced by using WebP compress. This won't works on iOS or Mac.

useInfinity.title: Infinity scroll
useInfinity.description: If enabled, next page search results will be added when you scroll to bottom (Like twitter). It makes more data transfers than paginations method.

locale.title: Language
locale.description: This setting can change locale in this site. This feature is not completed, so not all will be translated.

useRaw.title: Raw resolution
useRaw.description: If enabled, always uses raw resolution images. (You need to purchase by PYON at shop page)

useSakura.title: Blossom BG
useSakura.description: If enabled, blossom particles from gochiusa official page, will shown at background. (You need to purchase by PYON at shop page)

useViewer.title: Image viewer
useViewer.description: If enabled, you can rotate, flip and zoom at illustration pages. (You need to purchase by PYON at shop page)

colSize.title: Display columns
colSize.description: This can change display columns at result pages. (You need to purchase by PYON at shop page)

useMusicPlayer.title: UsagiPlayer
useMusicPlayer.description: If enabled, you can use youtube music player in this site. (You need to purchase by PYON at shop page)

tag.title: 複合タグ検索
tag.select_tags: タグを選択してください

notify.no_match: 一致する項目がありませんでした

keyword.title: キーワード検索
keyword.input_keyword: 検索したいキーワードを入力してください

notify.no_match: 一致する項目がありませんでした

bonus.title: Bonus
bonus.description: Need more PYON? You can get by rolling Gacha!

weekly.title: 週1ガチャ
weekly.description: 73%で1PYON、20%で2PYON、 5%で5PYON、 2%で10PYONが出る週1ガチャ。ソシャゲ並に渋いです。

monthly.title: 月1ガチャ
monthly.description: 85%で5PYON、10%で10PYON、4%で20PYON、1%で30PYONが出る月1ガチャ。ソシャゲよりも渋いです。

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: You can get PYON with daily login, or uploading gochiusa arts. PYON means thanks from admin for your support to keeps gochiira updated. PYON can be traded to cool features useable in this website.

products.TagEditor: 他のユーザーのイラストのタグを編集できるようにします
products.WikiWriter: キャラ、タグ、絵師の説明ページを編集できるようにします
